```rs
struct Developer {
    language: &'static str,
    status: &'static str,
}

fn main() {
    let me = Developer {
        language: "Rust",
        status: "Learning and exploring the Rust programming language",
    };

    println!("ü¶Ä {} aficionado", me.language);
    println!("Status: {}", me.status);
}
```
